dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.root.ch.EntitySpecCharUse
dataStructure.description:
A use of the CharacteristicSpecification by an EntitySpecification to which additional properties (attributes) apply or override the properties of similar properties contained in CharacteristicSpecification.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: EntitySpecCharUse

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which the CharacteristicSpecification is known and distinguished from other CharacteristicSpecifications.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains the CharacteristicSpecification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: unique
child.description:
An indicator that specifies if a value is unique for the specification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: unique

child.name: _package
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the associated CharacteristicSpecification is a composite.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _package

child.name: canBeOveridden
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the CharacteristicSpecValues associated with the CharacteristicSpec cannot be changed when instantiating a CharacteristicValue. For example, a bandwidth of 64 MB cannot be changed.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: canBeOveridden

child.name: minCardinality
child.description:
For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where zero is the value for the minCardinality.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: minCardinality

child.name: extensible
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the values for the characteristic can be extended by adding new values when instantiating a characteristic for an Entity.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: extensible

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time for which the use of the CharacteristicSpecification is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: maxCardinality
child.description:
The maximum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where five is the value for the maxCardinality.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: maxCardinality

child.name: catalogSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association EntitySpecCharUseDefines

This association end is optional
child.label: catalogSpecification
